title: Ticket #5414: condor_q -append statements don't affect queue line
description:
The new code for Queue lines is substituting $() before it parses the -append statements, so the following doesn't work the same way in 8.4 that it did in 8.2 

condor_submit -append "N=5" test.sub

where test.sub contains 

test.sub
N = 3
Executable = /bin/sleep
Queue $(N)

In 8.2 this would submit 5 jobs, now it submits 3.
check_ins: 2015-Nov-24 20:00   Check-in [46297]: fix for #5414, condor_submit -append changes did not affect the queue line because they weren't parsed until after $() macros on the queue line had already been expanded. this commit includes version history and an improved submit coverage test. ===VersionHistory:complete=== (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: johnkn
